title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
### Elevate Your Practice with Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat

**Experience Ultimate Comfort and Support with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat!**

#### Features at a Glance:
- **Extra-Thick & Soft Cushion:** Enjoy the ultimate comfort and support with our 2/5 inch thick mat, designed to provide maximum cushioning and stability during your yoga, Pilates, or floor exercises.
- **Teal Color:** Stand out in the studio or use it in the comfort of your home with our vibrant teal color that adds a splash of style to your space.
- **NBR Foam Material:** Made from high-quality NBR foam, our mat is durable, long-lasting, and easy to clean.
- **Perfect Size:** Measuring 72 inches long by 24 inches wide, this mat provides ample space for your practice, whether you're a beginner or an experienced yogi.
- **Includes Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap:** Say goodbye to the hassle of carrying your mat. Our included carrier strap makes it easy to transport and store.

#### Why Choose the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat?
- **Enhanced Flexibility and Stability:** Our extra-thick mat ensures you have the perfect balance of comfort and support, allowing you to focus on your practice without discomfort.
- **Versatility:** Suitable for a wide range of activities, including yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises, making it a versatile addition to your fitness routine.
- **Eco-Friendly:** Made with high-quality materials, our mat is designed to last, reducing the need for frequent replacements and minimizing waste.
- **Compact and Portable:** The included carrier strap means you can easily take your mat to the studio, gym, or practice at home, ensuring you're always ready for your next session.

#### Elevate Your Yoga Practice Today!
Upgrade your yoga routine with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Itâ€™s the perfect blend of comfort, support, and style. Order now and experience the difference for yourself!
